alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 3:24PM CDT until June 18 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/. * At 423 PM EDT/323 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Cottonwood to near Marianna, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 421 PM CDT, the Marianna Municipal Airport WeatherSTEM gusted to 56 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Midway, Quincy, Havana, Marianna, Donalsonville, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Attapulgus, Iron City, Climax, Brinson, Bascom and Rock Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
